feature: cat__community_water_challenges_Poor infrastructures especially during the rainy season

cat__community_water_challenges_The main challenges are the high cost of water and unreliable supply. Sometimes water trucks delay or bring water that is not clean. Many households depend on vendors, and not everyone can afford to buy enough water every week.
cat__additional_information_Fourteen years of independence is an ample time to have connected each and every household to clean potable water
cat__community_water_suggestions_Provide more clean and quality water sources
cat__school_water_challenges_Water is expensive, Water is far from classrooms, Poor water quality, Limited storage facilities

cat__community_water_challenges_Longtime distances to water points.
Poor storage facilities
cat__community_water_suggestions_Government has to invest in clean drinking water by connecting pipes under the ground to supply houses at least in the City, Juba.
cat__community_water_suggestions_Government should take the water supply into her hand not be left in the hand of the business personnels who are largely interested profits not public health.
